sentences.en: He is charged with kidnapping a businessman last year and holding him for ransom.
sentences.cn: 他被控于去年绑架了一名商人并勒索钱财。

sentences.en: He’s got the ransom money .
sentences.cn: 他得到了赎金。

sentences.en: Her kidnapper extorted a £75,000 ransom for her release.
sentences.cn: 绑架者索要75，000英镑赎金才肯放她。

sentences.en: His ransom has been effected.
sentences.cn: 他被用赎金赎回.

sentences.en: In Rio, nearly forty people have been held to ransom this year alone.
sentences.cn: 在里约热内卢，仅今年一年就有近40人被绑票。

sentences.en: The government refused to pay the ransom .
sentences.cn: 政府拒绝交付赎金。

sentences.en: The kidnappers asked for a ransom of fifty thousand dollars.
sentences.cn: 绑匪要求五万元赎金.

sentences.en: The kidnappers exacted a ransom of 10000 from the family.
sentences.cn: 绑架者向这家人家勒索10000英镑的赎金.

sentences.en: The kidnappers were demanding a ransom of $250,000.
sentences.cn: 绑匪索取25万美元的赎金。

sentences.en: The police caught the man who tried to abduct the boy for ransom.
sentences.cn: 警察抓住了那个企图拐走这男孩以便勒索赎金的家伙.

sentences.en: The ransom demand was made by telephone.
sentences.cn: 赎金是通过电话索要的。

sentences.en: The same system was used for ransoming or exchanging captives.
sentences.cn: 同一系统也被用来赎回或交换俘虏。

sentences.en: They have to pay a large ransom.
sentences.cn: 他们不得不付一大笔赎金.

sentences.en: They held the travellers for ransom.
sentences.cn: 他们将旅客当作人质索取赎金.

sentences.en: They levied a ransom on him.
sentences.cn: 他们向他索取赎金.

sentences.en: They levied a tax / a fine / a ransom on him.
sentences.cn: 他们向他征收税(罚金,索取赎金).

sentences.en: They took away the boy and held him to ransom.
sentences.cn: 他们劫持男孩勒索赎金.

sentences.en: They were all ransomed and returned unharmed.
sentences.cn: 付了赎金之后，他们都毫发无损地回来了。

sentences.en: We'd better arrange the ransom right away.
sentences.cn: 我们最好马上把索取赎金的事安排好.

sentences.en: We'll have to write a ransom note.
sentences.cn: 我们得写一张索取赎金通知.

trans.tran_cn: 付赎金救人，赎金，[神]赎罪
trans.tran_en: an amount of money that is paid to free someone who is held as a prisoner

trans.tran_cn: 赎回，赎；勒索赎金；救赎；得赎金后释放
trans.tran_en: If you ransom someone who has been kidnapped, you pay the money to set them free
